entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
